oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Description of abomasal displacements in dairy calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Medina-Cruz, Mario
Perezgrovas-Roblesgil, Alejandro
Garcia-Escamilla, Maria R.
Sanchez-Rubio, Miguel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abomasum
Blood chemistry
calf diseases
calves
cattle diseases
Dairy cattle
Diagnosis
Metabolic disorders
Stomach diseases
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of this paper was to evaluate the incidence of abomasal displacements in a large number of female dairy calves as weII as to determine their characteristics with regard to abdominal position, the efficacy of the diagnostic methods employed, the concurrent diseases present and the electrolyte and acid-base alterations occurring in these animals.
